EPP 0.3.3

Function to generate buffers intersected by Voronoi polygons.

Source: R/buff_voronoi.R
buff_voronoi.Rd

Generate buffers from points coordinates, according to a distance/s of radium, but intersect by Voronoi Polygons. The output of the function is a SpatialPolygonDataFrame with the id of the initial DataFrame.

buff_voronoi(x, id = "id", w_buff = 1000, crs = sp::CRS("+init=epsg:32721"))

Arguments

x

DataFrame with unless three variables: x, y, and id
id

Variable name (Character) to identify cases. Default = 'id'
w_buff

Buffer distance of radium in meters. Default = 1000
crs

Coordinate Reference Systems (CRS). Default = CRS("+init=epsg:32721")

Value

Return a SpatialPolygonDataFrame with the sames variables of the initial DataFrame#'

Examples

buf_centers <- buff_voronoi(centers_epp, id = 'id', w_buff = 1000, 
                           crs = sp::CRS("+init=epsg:32721"))
